# Cell line mixing:
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE162nnn/GSE162690/suppl/GSE162690_CellLine_HighLoading.fragments.tsv.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE162nnn/GSE162690/suppl/GSE162690_CellLine_LowLoading.fragments.tsv.gz

# The index files are generated by ArchR

# Not used:
gzip -d <fragment.tsv.gz>
bgzip <fragment.tsv>
tabix -p bed <fragment.tsv.gz>

#PBMC
wget https://cf.10xgenomics.com/samples/cell-arc/1.0.0/pbmc_granulocyte_sorted_10k/pbmc_granulocyte_sorted_10k_atac_fragments.tsv.gz
wget https://cf.10xgenomics.com/samples/cell-arc/1.0.0/pbmc_granulocyte_sorted_10k/pbmc_granulocyte_sorted_10k_atac_fragments.tsv.gz.tbi

# Chen_2019
fragment files provided by signac: https://stuartlab.org/signac/articles/snareseq.html
wget https://signac-objects.s3.amazonaws.com/snareseq/fragments.sort.bed.gz
wget https://signac-objects.s3.amazonaws.com/snareseq/fragments.sort.bed.gz.tbi
RNA:
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE126nnn/GSE126074/suppl/GSE126074_AdBrainCortex_SNAREseq_cDNA.barcodes.tsv.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE126nnn/GSE126074/suppl/GSE126074_AdBrainCortex_SNAREseq_cDNA.counts.mtx.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE126nnn/GSE126074/suppl/GSE126074_AdBrainCortex_SNAREseq_cDNA.genes.tsv.gz
mv GSE126074_AdBrainCortex_SNAREseq_cDNA.barcodes.tsv.gz barcodes.tsv.gz
mv GSE126074_AdBrainCortex_SNAREseq_cDNA.counts.mtx.gz matrix.mtx.gz
mv GSE126074_AdBrainCortex_SNAREseq_cDNA.genes.tsv.gz features.tsv.gz

# Ma_2019
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/samples/GSM4156nnn/GSM4156597/suppl/GSM4156597_skin.late.anagen.atac.fragments.bed.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/samples/GSM4156nnn/GSM4156597/suppl/GSM4156597_skin.late.anagen.barcodes.txt.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/samples/GSM4156nnn/GSM4156597/suppl/GSM4156597_skin.late.anagen.counts.txt.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/samples/GSM4156nnn/GSM4156597/suppl/GSM4156597_skin.late.anagen.peaks.bed.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/samples/GSM4156nnn/GSM4156597/suppl/GSM4156597_skin_celltype.txt.gz
wget https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/samples/GSM4156nnn/GSM4156608/suppl/GSM4156608_skin.late.anagen.rna.counts.txt.gz

# Buenrostro_2018
# the bam files are downloaded from this tutorial: https://reg-gen.readthedocs.io/en/latest/hint/tutorial-single-cell.html
wget https://costalab.ukaachen.de/open_data/scOpen/HematopoieticCells/HematopoieticCells.tar.gz --no-check-certificate

# the completed bam files are downloaded from here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/8o8f0xu6cvr46sm/AAB6FMIDvHqnG6h7athgcm5-a/Buenrostro_2018.tar.gz?dl=0
# the link is from https://github.com/pinellolab/scATAC-benchmarking/tree/master/Real_Data/Buenrostro_2018/input/sc-bams_nodup and https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/739011v1.full
# the meta file is from https://github.com/pinellolab/scATAC-benchmarking/blob/master/Real_Data/Buenrostro_2018/input/metadata.tsv
